nodes.text: Sunsails were a type of light vehicles that glided above the surface of the water thanks to a sail that captured the heat and transformed it to energy, keeping a skillful pilot aloft. On Equinox Day, the planetry capital of Hosnian Prime hosted sunsail races. Since they depended on the sun to keep going, sunsail gliders dipped closer to the water as the daylight began to fade.
